message: Mas Ridwannnnnn /read one/, the funny guy... Despite our short days as coworkers, I'll be missing you. I will remember you with warm thoughts and memories and I am very happy that you have a new opportunity. Best wishes to you in the future
Just a quick note. As you move forward in your glorious future may luck and success be always with you.
Makasih banyak atas semua kebaikannya mas Bejo! Sukses terus ke depannya demi kemajuan global Indonesia! Asiik!
Terima kasih sudah menjadi rekan kerja yang hebat! See you when I see you
It's always difficult to say goodbye, but congratulation on your new opportunity. Best wishes to you in the future

My Imam will leaving NiceDay :( We can't do "tunjuk-tunjukan" to being Imam anymore xD. Thanks for everything, Mas Bejo. So many things that you shared to Us. We will miss you (maybe) and see you on top (must) :)

H. Dede.
Muter.
Musik kita terus bercerita.
Block Cressida MCMXCI.
Cressida.
Good Luck Have Fun Bej!
Hati-hati di jalan.
Terima kasih banyak untuk semuanya.
Jo, I know it's difficult for you, but I do believe everything will be great eventually. Thanks for the contribution, really valuable and unforgettable. Success and keep healthy!
